name: JSparse Matrix Package
short_description: The JSparse Matrix Package, developed by Philipp Geigenmüller during an internship at the prudsys AG in Chemnitz, Germany, is an extension of the well-known Java Matrix Package (JAMA) and allows the use of sparse matrices and related algorithms.
